subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Kent Jones recovered from a tee shot in the rough to birdie No. 18 for a seven-under-par 65, giving him a share of the lead with the rookie Michael Letzig in the first round of the Ginn sur Mer Classic at Palm Coast, Fla. They led by two shots over Ryan Palmer. (AP).
